description:
T1 Lime - Crown lift to crown break, prune back to give up to 2m clearance from the building. Crown thin the remainder of the crown by up to 20%.
T2 Lime - Crown lift to crown break, prune back to give up to 2m clearance from the building. Crown thin the remainder of the crown by up to 20%.
T3 Robinia - Crown reduce by up to 50%, to approximately 12m above ground level and monitor.
T4 Weeping Elm - No works
T5 Robinia - Crown lift to 3m above ground level, remove deadwood and prune back to give 2m clearance from the building
T6 Lime - Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction, by approximately 2m. lift to crown break
T7 Sycamore - Lift to crown break and crown thin by up to 20%.
T7a Sycamore Stump - Fell and poison or fell and grind out stump.
T8 Sycamore - Lift to crown break and crown thin by up to 20%. Prune back from building to give 2m clearance.
T9 Ash - Lift to crown break, crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction, by approximately 2m. Prune back from building to give 2m clearance.
T10 Cherry - Crown reduce by 30%, by  approximately  2m. and lift top crown break.
T11 Cherry - Crown lift to 2m, remove deadwood and monitor.
T12 Lime - Lift to crown break, crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction, by approximately 2.5m. Prune back from building to give 2m clearance.
T13 Ash - Lateral crown reduction to the last previous points of reduction, by approximately 2m and crown. Lift to six meters above ground level.
T14 Cherry - Crown lift to 3m, Crown reduce by approximately 1.5m and remove epicormic growth from stem.
T14a Judas Tree - Sever and poison ivy.
T15 - Norway Maple - Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction, by approximately 2.5m.
T15 Tree of Heaven - Remove deadwood
T17 Sycamore - Crown reduce to the last previous points of reduction, by approximately 2m. Lift to crown break.
(B) Various - Saplings on the fence line - pushing over fences - Fell and poison stumps
T18 Sycamore - Crown r
